attributes.action: Ban racist and homophobic words being used on social media
attributes.additional_details: Its 2021 people shouldn't have to still be dealing with being racially or homophobic abuse. We need to do more to protect these people.
attributes.background: Automatic lifetime ban imposed on social media for anyone posting certain racist and homophobic words on social media

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591691
